page.title: 15CLOTHES
page.content: Todays clothes worn by toddlers, are mainly dungerees.These are nearly always made of denim,basicaly because they are hard-wearing. Girls mainly wear frilly dresses and t-shirts which have some simple motif or design. {Teenagers}mostly wear flower tops or blouses,baggies, which are lose trousers.{Make-up}is mostly blue eye liner, pink and purple eye shadow. Boys wear baggies,necklaces,some {make-up, baggie shirts}and{jumpers.} Older people wear flared trousers mainly dark colours, for example brown,black and grey.They wear big hard shoes which may be more comfortable for them.
